name: YouTube
description: Exports your YouTube profile, subscriptions, playlists, playlist items, liked videos, watch later list, and last 1 month watch history using Playwright browser automation.

scopes.label: Your YouTube profile
scopes.description: Email, channel URL, handle, and joined date (plus optional channel fields like title, avatar, and stats)

scopes.label: Your playlists
scopes.description: Playlists visible in your YouTube Library

scopes.label: Your playlist items
scopes.description: Videos inside your playlists, including titles and URLs

scopes.label: Your watch history (last 1 month)
scopes.description: Raw watch history entries for roughly the last 30 days
